Class Ensemble

source code

            object --+        
                     |        
core.AbstractContainer --+    
                         |    
  core.AbstractNIContainer --+
                             |
                object --+   |
                         |   |
            AbstractEntity --+
                             |
                            Ensemble

Represents an ensemble of multiple Structure models. Provides a list-like access to these models:

>>> ensemble[0]
<Structure Model 1: accn, x chains>
>>> ensemble.models[1]
<Structure Model 1: accn, x chains>
